overview: We hit the road to find out what made this school one of the top party schools in the country. We partied with everyone from fraternity guys, jocks, nerds and even GIRLS! Our girls gave so many blowjobs that their jaws were sore for a week! I guess the students don't know not to kiss and tell, because the national news got a hold of the story and things have been crazy. Who would have thought that sex could be so controversial?
title: Shane's World 32: Campus Invasion
